Question
========

The table below plots the church affiliation of a sample of 1,000 individuals plotted.

  --------------------- ------ --------------------- ------------ Church affiliation Code Absolute frequency Percentage None 0 372 37 Roman Catholic 1 337 34 Dutch reformed 2 169 17 Reformed 3 80 8 Other 4 52 5 --------------------- ------ --------------------- ------------

What center dimensions are/is meaningful to calculate here?

Answerlist
----------

* Mean, mode and median
* Mode and median
* Median only
* Mode only

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Mean, mode and median: Incorrect
* Mode and median: Incorrect
* Only median: Incorrect
* Only mode: Correct
